p: The 23 selected papers described historical approaches to ASF eradication and were included in the qualitative analysis (defined as “qualitative synthesis”). Three of these originated from Cuba, 1 from Belgium, 4 from Brazil, 3 from Spain (1 of the three papers retrieved for Spain [ref Table 2, Arias and Sánchez-Vizcaíno ( 67), was also considered as eligible for Portugal, and was therefore counted once in the methodological approach, but is listed twice in Table 2), 3 from Portugal, 4 from mainland Italy, 1 from Malta, 2 from France, and 2 from the Dominican Republic and Haiti. Table 3 summarizes the literature analysis according to surveillance and intervention strategies.
